-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ETCold = ETCold
local SystemIO = System.IO
local SystemCryptography = System.Security.Cryptography
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("MD5Helper", function (namespace)
    local FileMD5
    FileMD5 = function (filePath)
      local retVal
      System.using(SystemIO.FileStream(filePath, SystemIO.FileMode.Open), function (file)
        local md5 = SystemCryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider()
        retVal = md5:ComputeHash(file)
      end)
      return ETCold.ByteHelper.ToHex(retVal, "x2")
    end
    return {
      FileMD5 = FileMD5
    }
  end)
end)
